title: Day 25 - The Only Sensible Ritual Pasta
itunes:title: Day 25 - The Only Sensible Ritual Pasta
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
There are all kinds of rituals out there. Rituals that would test your faith. Rituals that will test your desire. Rituals that will test how much pain you can endure? But if you were truly presented with such a thing...how best should you react?

***
